form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Classify Status of Alien Relative for Issuance of Immigrant Visa, Form No. 4-3041

full_text: UNITED STATES OF JUSTICE Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 Immigration and Naturalization Service SLB CHECKED APR 1 S 1974 Form approved OMB No. 43-RO401 PETITION TO Date filed CLASSIFY STATUS OF 10.00 Fee stamp Sea74-186-7 ALIEN RELATIVE FOR IMMIC VICE ISSUANCE OF IMMIGRANT VISA DATE 3-29-74 BY ak TO THE SECRETARY OF STATE: The following documents seen The petition was filed on March 29,1974 and returned Remarks Proof of citizenship Marriage certificate The petition is approved for status under section: Birth certificate petitioner Birth certificate beneficiary SPOUSE Divorce decree, petitioner 201 (b) CHILD 203 (a) (2) DATE U.S. APPROVED INS, Divorce decree, beneficiary OF ACTION 201 (b) PARENT 203 (a) (4) APR 16 1974 DD R. W. AHERA 203 (a) (1) 203 (a) (5) DISTRICT SEATTLE, WASH (PETITIONER IS NOT TO WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE) 1. Petition is hereby made to classify the status of the alien beneficiary for issuance of an immigrant visa as: (Check one) The spouse, child (regardless of age), parent, brother, or sister of a United States citizen. The spouse or unmarried child (regardless of age) of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence. Block I. - Information About Alien Beneficiary 2. Name (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 3. Do Not Write in This Space 4. Relationship of beneficiary to petitioner NGUYEN NHAT THI Mother 6. Are beneficiary and petitioner related by adoption? 5. Other names used; (including maiden name if married woman) TRAN DINH DAN NO 7. Place of birth (Country) 8. Date of birth (Month, day, year) 9. Beneficiary's marital status: Viet Nam Dec. 12, 1906 Married Widowed Divorced Single 10. Petitioner's name (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 11. Petitioner's phone 12. Has this beneficiary ever been in the U.S.? McGEEVER Dieuxuan Tran 206-475-1788 Yes No 13. Name of beneficiary's spouse, married and date and country of birth "Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) FOIA (b)(6) 14. Names, birthdates and countries of birth of beneficiary's children, if any Dieuxuan Tran McGEEVER July 14, 1930 VietNam Tran Thi Lan June 15, 1933 VietNam APF 15. Full address of beneficiary's spouse and children, if any (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) 6675 Homestead Ave. E. Tacoma, Washington 98404 11 Le Van Duyet Camp, Saigon, VietNam Seattle 16. If this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: a. Date and place of your present marriage b. Number of your prior marriages C. Number of prior marriages of spouse N/A 311185 d. Last address at which you and your spouse resided together From To (Town or cityl (State or Province) (Country) (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) 17. If this petition is for a child, (a). Is the child married? (b) Is the child your adopted child? If so, give the names, dates, and places of birth of all other children adopted by you. If none, SO state N/A 18. If this petition is for a brother or sister, are both your parents the same as the alien's parents? N/A If not, submit a separate statement giving full details as to parentage, dates of marriage of parents, and the number of previous marriages of each parent. 19. If separate petitions are also being submitted for other relatives, give names of each and relationship to petitioner N/A 20. Have you ever filed a petition for this alien before? NO If so, give place and date of filing and result: FORM 1-130 (REV. 1-1-73)N APR 16' 1974 TRANS. IN APR.
